title: Alkaloid - The Malkuth Grimoire 2015  ak6103
description:
ALKALOID is a new band created by five good friends, who happen to be well-known musicians of the metal genre, Morean (Dark Fortress, Noneuclid), Christian Muenzner (Spawn of Possession, ExÃ‚Â­-Obscura, ExÃ‚Â­-Necrophagist), Danny Tunker (Aborted, ExÃ‚Â­-God Dethroned), Linus Klausenitzer (Obscura, Noneuclid), and Hannes Grossmann (Blotted Science, ExÃ‚Â­-Obscura, ExÃ‚Â­-Necrophagist). Their intention is to go beyond any limit that metal music sub-genres might have these days and create the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most extreme progressive metal band.

They define themselves through the field of tension created between musical opposites. All band members are active death metal musicians who nevertheless all have a much broader view of music than blast beats and growls. They establish from the beginning that they have many faces, and that oscillating between (seemingly) contrary or mutually exclusive styles is an important factor. ALKALOID set out to push the boundaries of progressive, extreme music on their impressive full-length debut The Malkuth Grimoire


he lineup consists of:

    Morean (Dark Fortress, Noneuclid) - Vocals, Guitars
    Christian Muenzner (Spawn of Possession, Ex-Obscura, Ex-Necrophagist) - Guitars
    Danny Tunker (Aborted, Ex-God Dethroned) - Guitars
    Linus Klausenitzer (Obscura, Noneuclid) - Bass
    Hannes Grossmann (Blotted Science, Ex-Obscura, Ex-Necrophagist) Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Drums
